input.sentences: we went to town hall in the morning to figure out where we were going .
they had a map out front that showed us the town .
we started our walk behind city hall .
the streets had a lot of big | tall trees .
we saw a big hill that we had to walk down .
output.sentences: The town hall is open every morning.
Out front, there is a map of the whole town.
Town hall is in the center of town so that anybody can easily walk to it.
You can tell the building is old because it is surrounded by old trees.
I walk up a hill to visit town hall every day.
